# Interface TextGenerationConfig6

Configuration for text generation

interface TextGenerationConfig6 {  
frequency_penalty?: string | number;  
logit_bias?: { bias_value: string | number; token_id: string }[];  
max_new_tokens?: string | number;  
max_prompt_length?: string | number;  
presence_penalty?: string | number;  
repetition_penalty?: string | number;  
seed?: string | number;  
stop_sequences?: string[];  
temperature?: string | number;  
top_p?: string | number;  
}

##### Index

### Properties

frequency_penalty? logit_bias? max_new_tokens? max_prompt_length? presence_penalty? repetition_penalty? seed? stop_sequences? temperature? top_p?

## Properties

### `Optional`frequency_penalty

frequency_penalty?: string | number

Frequency penalty

### `Optional`logit_bias

logit_bias?: { bias_value: string | number; token_id: string }[]

Logit bias to modify token likelihood

#### Type declaration

  * ##### bias_value: string | number

Bias value from -100 to 100

  * ##### token_id: string

ID of the token




### `Optional`max_new_tokens

max_new_tokens?: string | number

Maximum number of tokens to generate

### `Optional`max_prompt_length

max_prompt_length?: string | number

Maximum length of the prompt in tokens

### `Optional`presence_penalty

presence_penalty?: string | number

Presence penalty

### `Optional`repetition_penalty

repetition_penalty?: string | number

Repetition penalty

### `Optional`seed

seed?: string | number

Random seed for controlling the randomness of text generation

### `Optional`stop_sequences

stop_sequences?: string[]

List of sequences to stop generation

### `Optional`temperature

temperature?: string | number

Controls randomness of generated text

### `Optional`top_p

top_p?: string | number

Probability for most probable tokens sampling
